name: The adventures of Saltbeard - Cheapest hooker of the carribean
name_original: The adventures of Saltbeard - Cheapest hooker of the carribean
description:
Join Saltbeard the pirate on his adventure for gold and fortune! Using his grappling hook, no obstacle is insurmountable. Traverse 3 differently themed levels, solve some puzzels and collect gold coins along the way.

Controls:
WD - move left and right
Spacebar - jump
Left mouse - shoot grappling hook
Right mouse - cancel grappling hook
QE - change hook length

This was our very first unity project back in the day. The physics are all over the place but it's still a lot of fun!

Character and grappling hook: Dries Deryckere
Props and Level design: Jasper Demulder
Additional programming: Pieter V
